author: pderop
msg: Fixed isAutoConfig, which must return false, instead of true. Don't invoke any callbacks.

author: mtylenda
msg: OPENJPA-1932: Documentation update: remove Java 5 references (OpenJPA requires Java 6), remove sjvm setting from examples (no longer needed), improve formatting (we should remember to use literal/classname tags), fix typos.

author: pderop
msg: Don't deactive services from a stopping bundle, since DependencyManager is already doing this.

author: cmpilato
msg: Avoid unnecessary abstraction by combining a factory function with its
(get_dumpstream_loader): Remove, moving all its logic into ...
(load_revisions): Just call load_dumpstream() now rather than the

author: pderop
msg: - aligned AspectService and AdapterService with new added/changed/removed callbacks introdoced in the API.
- improved annotation plugin logging: a "log" configuration can now be specified in the maven or bnd plugin.
- fixed bug when parsing ConfigurationDependency Annotation: the "updated" field was ignored.
- Generate DM metadata descriptors under META-INF instead of OSGI-INF
